Class Solver

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.Solver
public class Solver extends Object
The Solver class is responsible for solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using a plan of intersections and sections. It utilizes a strategy pattern to solve the problem and supports multiple solving strategies.

This class works with a complete graph representation of the problem and provides methods to compute the optimal path, update delivery points dynamically, and calculate the served points within a specified time limit.

Since:
2024-04-27

  • Constructor Details

    • Solver

      public Solver(Plan plan, List<Integer> vertices, SolvingStrategy solvingStrategy)
      Constructs a Solver with the specified plan, vertices, and solving strategy.
      Parameters:
      plan - the Plan object representing intersections and sections
      vertices - the list of vertices to include in the TSP
      solvingStrategy - the strategy used to solve the TSP

  • Method Details

    • init

      public Solver init()
      Initializes the solver by creating a complete graph representation of the problem.
      Returns:
      the initialized Solver object

      public List<Integer> addDeliveryPoint(Integer intersection)
      Adds a new delivery point to the TSP and updates the best path.

      Returns:
      the updated best path as a List of vertex indices

      Parameters:
      intersection - the intersection ID to delete
      Returns:
      the updated best path as a List of vertex indices

    • computePointsToBeServed

      public void computePointsToBeServed()
      Computes the points that can be served within the time limit.

    • getBestPossiblePath

      public List<Integer> getBestPossiblePath()

      Returns:

    • getPointsWithTime

      public Map<Integer,LocalTime> getPointsWithTime()
      Retrieves the time mapping for each point on the best path.
      Returns:
      a Map of vertex indices to their corresponding LocalTime

    • getBestPossibleCost

      public double getBestPossibleCost()
      Retrieves the cost of the best possible path that can be served within the time limit.
      Returns:
      the best possible cost as a double

    • getTimeExceeded

      public boolean getTimeExceeded()
      Checks if the solving strategy exceeded the time limit during computation.
      Returns:
      true if the time limit was exceeded, false otherwise
